text: aur khuda hee ne tumako paida kiya phir vahee tumako (duniya se) utha lega aur tumamen se baaz aise bhee hain jo zaleel zindagee (sakht budhaape) kee taraph lautae jaate hain (bahut kuchh) jaanane ke baad (aise sadeele ho gae ki) kuchh nahin jaan sake beshak khuda (sab kuchh) jaanata aur (har tarah kee) kudarat rakhata hai
